content: 1 fss chain 1 into fr double_crochet 3 treble_crochet 4 double_crochet treble_crochet 4 double_crochet 3 treble_crochet double_crochet chain 1 slip_stitch 5 chart i first half of round 2 chain 1 single_crochet half_double_crochet in next double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st twice single_crochet in each of the next 5 sts chain 1 chart j return round chain 1 single_crochet in same st as previous st single_crochet in each of next 4 sts 2 single_crochet in next st twice 2 half_double_crochet in next st half_double_crochet single_crochet in next st chain 1 slip_stitch into center ring work slip_stitch between current motif and the next one continue to next motif and repeat until all motifs are finished ending with a slip_stitch in next st finish off divider motif small divider motifs can be inserted at any time between other motifs and are worked the same way regardless of the string s orientation to insert a divider work a fsc and then work 4 single_crochet into ring then continue on to the next motif in the string on return row work 5 single_crochet into the ring and then single_crochet between the divider and the next motif then carry on with the next motif see this video for a more detailed explanation copyright 2021 lisa hounshell 6
